name: Powershell Scripting
tagline: Custom scripts built for powershell including the main CALL script.
body:
## Welcome to my Powershell Scripting.


Hi my name is Chris McCafferty and I enjoy learning new things and putting myself to the test. I am also capable of teaching myself new skills and abilities. I am very proficient in powershell scripting and A+ Hardware and Software

I have been coding a few scripts for powershell for awhile now while also having a few more tasks on the go.


Here are a few links for my powershell scripting

    * [Call sript](http://pastebin.com/wwf3CBjW)         This is the main script

and there are more scripts to be added over time
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
